name: The Eclipse (curlyGoblin)
description:
Exploration / Movement WASD / Arrow Keys Rotation  Q/E & Numpad 1/2 Engage Enemy / Pickup Health  Spacebar  Menu Esc

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my submission for https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2023. 

The Eclipse is a DungeonCrawler that uses a trick-taking game for combat.

 The Moon and Sun will alternate during battle and exploration - affecting how combat is resolved. 

Players will level up  and replace cards in their deck  to improve their odds. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Trick-Taking Combat Notes: If you’re not sure what a tricking-taking game is, there is a short tutorial to help in-game. I have notes below as well.

  • Combat is resolved with a trick-taking game.
  • Each trick will involve 2 cards played by both the enemy and the player.
  • The first card played each trick will set the winning suite.
  • Any card can be played, but only cards matching the lead suite will count. Wild cards count towards any suite.
  • If a wild leads a suite, then all suites count that trick.
  • ~~~~
  • The loser of a trick will take damage for each card played
  • If the enemy and player both play a winning card with the same value, a PARRY occurs
  • Parried cards will be set aside and the loser of the next trick will take additional damage for any cards that were parried. This can stack until a parry does not occur
  • ~~~~
  • A coin flip determines who leads when a battle starts
  • The loser of a trick, will start the next turn
  • After a parry, a coin flip determines who leads next
  • ~~~~
  • During The Eclipse, the Moon and Sun will alternate
  • Under a Sun, the HIGHEST card will win the trick
  • Under a Moon the LOWEST card will win the trick
  • Cards with Moon or Sun symbols will  change the win condition during battle
